thread.title: Andy Roddick leads Team Elton John to WTT Smash Hits win
thread.title_full: Andy Roddick leads Team Elton John to WTT Smash Hits win

title: Andy Roddick leads Team Elton John to WTT Smash Hits win
text:
KLTV Closed Captioning Andy Roddick leads Team Elton John to WTT Smash Hits win 
LAS VEGAS (AP) - Andy Roddick defeated James Blake 5-1 in singles to lead Team Elton John to a 17-11 victory over Team Billie Jean King at the Mylan World Team Tennis Smash Hits event. 
Roddick and Mardy Fish beat Andre Agassi and James Blake in doubles for Team Elton at Caesars Palace. 
Lindsay Davenport and Martina Navratilova outlasted Stefanie Graf and Tracy Austin of Team Billie Jean. In mixed doubles, Las Vegas residents Agassi and Graf defeated Fish and Navratilova. 
More than $1 million was raised for the Elton John AIDS Foundation, with part of the proceeds benefiting the local charity Aid for AIDS of Nevada. Copyright 2015 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
